reviewText: Ok first of this is deffinatly a hentia title.  Its a cute hentia title, but a hentia title none the less.  I was very shocked at how well drawn some of the characters were, and there were some very non-sex related funny scenes (I'm sorry but these characters looked hilarious when having sex).  Best scene was the disco dance off, and the whole part with the dinisours.  Mainly my only real problem with this was the sex.  This title could have been so great if there was just a little less of it.  There are only three sex scenes, but in a thirty min. video it can cause everything else to suffer.  The goddesses also didn't get enough attention.  Yes the girl on the cover keeps her clothing on the whole series.  Suwatee and Sheree were great, and I really got a kick out of them trying to help the main dude (can't remember his name).  I would recommend this one to anyone who is over 18 or can handle some sex (no younger then maybe 16).  Great video none the less.

This vdo is for adults only(18 & over). It's a Japanese anime (cartoon like Dragonball Z). The title of the vdo is actually "Can Can Bunny Extra", not Can Can Bunny 1. Story revolves around a goddess and a  young japanese boy in search of a REALLY GOOD TIME! . Animation is pretty  well drawn and the vdo is subtitled. The vdo is 30 minutes long and only  has 1 episode of the series. A Soft Cell Pictures production. Overall, I  think the vdo was worth watching but compared to the anime "New  Angel", New Angel rules! Go check it out if you haven't.
